nodes.bodyText: this won't work on mac/linux when nucleus is not running as root and processes are able to be run as other uses via sudo- but it arguably wasn't working very well before anyway

Yeah I found that out unfortunately. Fixed it though by just calling out to kill with the user decorator as before.
Still see some warnings for "operation not permitted", but the processes seem to die...

2 seconds seems pretty short. Ideally this should be configurable. I'm okay to use a hardcoded value here for now, but I would extend the wait time, such as 30 seconds. Also add a log if the waitFor return false.
